msContents.summary: The <title xml:lang="fr">Ezourvedam</title>. Copy of Anquetil-Duperron (see Rocher 1984, p. 8), with his annotations, made on Voltaire's copy kept in the Bibliothèque du Roi (<ref target="https://archivesetmanuscrits.bnf.fr/ark:/12148/cc40407x"> BnF NAF 452</ref>), and supplemented. French is standardised in the transcription below.

collation.desc: 1 folio = <emph rend="bold">guard leaf</emph>. f[1]r marbled. Blank recto verso. Element of library binding.
1 folio = <emph rend="bold">guard leaf</emph>. Element of library binding. Additions on recto. Verso blank.

58 folios = <emph rend="bold"><title xml:lang="fr">Ezourvedam</title></emph>. Arabic library foliation 1-58 on top right. The leaves are hinged in the volume. The paper of f3-f58 is more thin than that of f1-f2, which appear to be guard leaves of the original copy.
2 folios = <emph rend="bold">Ezourvedam: Notes by Anquetil Duperron</emph>. Arabic library foliation 1-2 on top right.
56 folios = <emph rend="bold">Ezourvedam: Text</emph>. Arabic library foliation 3-58 on top right. Original partial pagination. Several numbered quires.
1 folio = <emph rend="bold">guard leaf</emph>. Blank recto verso. Element of library binding.
1 folio = <emph rend="bold">guard leaf</emph>. f[1]v marbled. Blank recto verso. Element of library binding.
